As an evolutionary adaptation, cats have developed a mechanism whereby their heads are measuring devices, as their bodies can fit through any space that their heads can, and this physiology is a safeguard that _________ their success as a species.
Blank (i)
(A) reproduces
(B) ensures
(C) enhances
(D) mitigates
(E) inundates
